data.title: The pizza is always cooked right.
data.text: There is a Little Caesars about 2 miles closer but, I choose to use this store. The service is pleasant and fast, and the pizza is never over-cooked, or taste like it's been sitting under a heat lamp.

data.title: PIzza Pizza
data.text: Great place for a quick and inexpensive Pizza and a Dew when there is no groceries in the fridge.  Usually quick in and out friendly service.

data.title: Good food ,  good prices .   many ready to go when you get there !
data.text: Little Ceasars makes good pizzas ,  round ,  and square .   They may not be world class ,  but for the price ,  they're GOOD !   Lots of items on the menu ,  Pizza in many forms ,  Salads ,  Pop ,  etc..   FAST food !   Polite staff !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

data.title: Great prices for carry out food.
data.text: Always go here, as we live nearby. Fast service. Decent food. But, the price is what keeps me coming back. I can feed 3 boys, and still get a piece myself, for $5 or so. You can't do that at McDonald's or any fast food place. Little Caesars is a deal.

data.title: Local good stuff
data.text: They aren't kidding when they say Hot & Ready. I have two teens & the fact that we can pull a few pizzas from this location that ARE hot & tasty (that's what they should call it!) and they like it AND it's not expensive because they eat a LOT is perfect for our family. And I don't have to cook. Win win all around!

data.title: Pizza Pizza
data.text: Getting Little Caesers Pizza for years.  I go to this location for a lunch at work, and also the one in Berkley, close to home.  You can't go wrong with a $5 pizza.  Great price and the pizza is hot and ready.  I am only giving a 3 star because I am pizza'd out from this place.  Perhaps in a few months, I will get the craving back.  Meanwhile, $5 pizza....... pick up a few for a party or meeting, always quick and easy.  Many locations, so no need to travel too far.   Deep dish is also a good deal.
